Package userinterface

Class UIForm

java.lang.Object
userinterface.AbstractFrame
userinterface.DocumentCell
userinterface.UIForm
public class UIForm
extends DocumentCell
A class to denote the graphical concept of a form. A UIform contains a ContentSpan as contents and an associated action attribute to denote how to URL must be formed in combination with the values that are input by the user.

  • Constructor Details

    • UIForm

      public UIForm​(int x, int y, java.lang.String action, DocumentCell formContent)
      Create a new UIForm-object.
      Parameters:
      x - : The x coordinate of this UIForm.
      y - : The y coordinate of this UIForm.
      action - : The action attribute of the HTML-counterpart.
      formContent - : The content off the form. This should not directly or indirectly contain other UIForm-objects.

  • Method Details

    • getHandleMouse

      public ReturnMessage getHandleMouse​(int id, int x, int y, int clickCount, int button, int modifier)
      Get the response from this UIForm of a given click.
      Overrides:
      getHandleMouse in class DocumentCell
      Parameters:
      id - : The id of the click
      x - : The x coordinate of the click
      y - : The y coordinate of the click
      clickCount - : The number of clicks that occurred.
      button - : Which mouse button was clicked.
      modifier - : Extra control key that was held during the click.
      Returns:
      A representation of this UIForm's state encapsulated in a ReturnMessage object of the ReturnMessage.Type Form: containing the action attribute and name=value pairs of UITextInputFields.

    • handleKey

      public void handleKey​(int id, int keyCode, char keyChar, int modifiersEx)
      Send the given KeyEvent to this UIForm's content.
      Overrides:
      handleKey in class Frame
      Parameters:
      id - : The KeyEvent (Associated with type of KeyEvent)
      keyCode - : The KeyEvent code (Determines the involved key)
      keyChar - : The character representation of the involved key
      modifiersEx - : Specifies other keys that were involved in the event
